intro.title: Problems with your Software?
intro.question1: Are you in need of capacity?
intro.question2: Do you have problems with new technologies?
intro.question3: Does the project contain too much risk?

answer.title: Then we are your solution!
answer.description: Whether it is a web client or a database adapter, our young team will help you too solve those problems.

user.title: Customer
user.description: During the development we count on continuous communication with our customer.

design.title: Design
design.description: We are always looking for new design trends and the best possible user experience.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: We are not afraid to learn new technologies for a client.

granalyzer.title: Granalyzer
granalyzer.description: This diagramming tool allows you to create and visualize graphs of elements and their relations to each other. As you can reuse elements in multiple diagrams, creating those visualizations becomes remarkably fast.

assembus.title: Assembus
assembus.description: Optimize and plan your manufacturing line. With Assembus you get an extensive tool to visualize the assembly process of complex products in 3D. Therefore, you can spread the individual steps over different stations and in the end, pass the whole process in review with the Cinema Mode.
